item.title: Building Web Components using Large Language Models
item.description: Quick discussion of my recent experience bootstrapping the CL-web-components project

item.title: Setting up my Raspberry Pi 500, a Portable Workstation
item.description: Quick notes on configuring a Raspberry Pi 500 as a portable workstation along with a price list.

item.title: Book review, "Man and the Computer"
item.description: A book review of a vintage computer publication, "Man and the Computer" by John G. Kemeny, published 1972, ISBN: 0684130092 Read at the Open Library, <https://openlibrary.org/books/OL5282840M/Man_and_the_computer>

item.title: Working with Structured Data in Deno and TypeScript
item.description: A short discourse on working with structured data in TypeScript and easily converting from JSON, YAML and XML representations.

item.title: Moving beyond git template repositories with CodeMeta
item.description: An exploration of using CodeMeta objects to generate of software artifacts as an alternative to Git template repositories.
